lead_paragraph: Two slacker morgue workers, Motown and Darius, are desparate to win the KHIP HOP 3on3 Streetball Tournament - which they lose year after year.  The problem is, they can never seem to find anyone to play on their team. But when a fellow morgue worker, Franklin, creates a huge Frankenstein type creature, Motown and Darius think they've struck streetball gold.
